Description
<<<<<<< HEAD It gives a lowpass analog elliptic prototype filter of nth order, with a Peak-to-peak passband ripple of Rp dB and a stopband attenuation of Rs dB. ======= This is an Octave function. It designs a lowpass analog elliptic filter of nth order, with a Peak-to-peak passband ripple of Rp and a stopband attenuation of Rs. >>>>>>> 6bbb00d0f0128381ee95194cf7d008fb6504de7d
